name: Mega Man-Boss Rush 3
description:
★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

- Space to charge and fire your blaster and select boss

- Press Up arrow or W when touching a wall to Wall Jump

- Press C to dash and gain extra momentum

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

A group of robots called Mavericks want to take over the world. It is up to Mega Man X to put and end to them, and face off against their diabolical leader, Sigma.

Bosses Ranked from Easiest to Hardest:
- Chill Penguin
- Storm Eagle
- Armored Armadillo
- Launch Octopus
- Flame Mammoth
- Boomer Kuwanger
- Sting Chameleon
- Spark Mandrill
- Vile
- Sigma

NOTE: Some bosses (especially Vile and Sigma) are meant to be difficult. It is completely normal if you don't defeat them on your first try.

Remember to love and favorite if you enjoyed, it really helps out a lot.
